section.title: Tracking of changes in response to the 4th Public Review
section.para: This section tracks major changes made to this specification compared to the Committee Specification Draft 04 https://docs.oasis-open.org/lexidma/dmlex/v1.0/csd04/dmlex-v1.0-csd04.pdf.pdf. The fourth Public Review took place from 10 September 2024 until 11 October 2024.

listitem.para: No changes were made except administratively progressiong the draft to Committee Specification.
